about_the_game:
In "Sapo Xulé and Unwanted Marriage" our hero uses his skills in “Kung-Fu-Chulé” to defeat the Sapo King's army and the Henchmen's Syndicate, in order to prevent the forced marriage of his beloved with the ruler of Sapópolis .
STINKY FEET INCLUDED, BE CAREFUL!!!





Worried about his low popularity, Sapo King, the mayor of Sapópolis (and self-styled King), discovers that the population longs for a first lady! To resolve the situation, he orders the snake Sibila to create a love potion to be used on the “candidate” for marriage. The problem is the chosen one: Sapita, the most fragrant and beautiful frog in the city, and Sapo Xulé's “girlfriend”. Upon learning, our hero sets out to rescue his beloved, but will encounter many challenges along the way, such as the Royal Guard and the Henchmen's Syndicate, who will do everything to stop him in time for the wedding to take place.





• Sapo Xulé's iconic return to the world of games, in his first game fully developed for the character and his universe, taking advantage of elements from all the media in which he previously participated;
• 2D platform game with graphics handcrafted by the character's creator, artist Paulo José;
• Six levels/worlds with themed stages and boss battles;
• In addition to the “Kung-Fu-Chulé” attacks, the hero will have the help of the little fly Dorotéia, which will help him collect items and increase his range when jumping and moving;
• Shop for purchasing items and unlockables that go back to Sapo Xulé's 30-year history;
• Original soundtrack created by musicians Leandro and Nelton Matioli;
• Original Game Engine created by Squash Studios;

In "Sapo Xulé and Unwanted Marriage" our hero uses his skills in “Kung-Fu-Chulé” to defeat the Sapo King's army and the Henchmen's Syndicate, in order to prevent the forced marriage of his beloved with the ruler of Sapópolis .
STINKY FEET INCLUDED, BE CAREFUL!!!





Worried about his low popularity, Sapo King, the mayor of Sapópolis (and self-styled King), discovers that the population longs for a first lady! name: Sapo Xulé and the Unwanted Marriage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Sapo Xulé is back! To celebrate the character's 30th anniversary, Squash Studios and the character's creator, artist Paulo José, announce “Sapo Xulé e o Casamento Indesejado”, a 2D platform game inspired by the character's games released in the 90s.
